DOC.brief_summary: The Aim study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics Asian healthy male administer single dose BI 135585 .
DOC.brief_title: Single Rising Dose Study BI 135585 XX Health Asian Male Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male volunteer , 2 . Chinese Japanese ethnicity Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure ( BP ) , pulse rate ( PR ) electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ) deviate normal clinical relevance accord investigator medical judgement 2 . Any evidence clinically relevant concomitant disease 3 . Intake drug long half life ( > 24 hour ) within least one month le 10 halflives respective drug prior administration
